"Use Twin Machineguns Like This...":
"Twin machineguns are a Gunner's weapon of choice.
They can lay down a blistering barrage of bullets, but
they can also be used along with acrobatic moves!
Hm? You want to learn how to use them? I'd love
to give you some pointers! Start with some practice.
You know the drill: kill, kill, kill! Oh, and I'll give
you a pair of twin machineguns, so please
fight with just those, okay?
*Recommended: Twin machineguns-only mission
"Trapping Nav Rappy""

"Twin Assaults
*One pair of twin assaults will be provided per account at the time the request is accepted."
